actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A bill to amend the joint resolution codifying the rules and customs pertaining to the display and use of the United States flag to establish the appropriate placement of flags displayed at building entrances.

summary.text: Declares that any U.S. flag displayed on a staff in front of an entrance to a building should be located to the left of persons entering the building.

titles.title: A bill to amend the joint resolution codifying the rules and customs pertaining to the display and use of the United States flag to establish the appropriate placement of flags displayed at building entrances.
